marksData.learningOutcome: JOSEPHINE RESPONES WITH SMILES AND CURIOSITY DURING BIBLE LESSONS. SHE IS BEGINNING TO RECOGNIZE FAMILIAR SONGS, PRAYERS, AS WE ENGAGE IN THE ACTIVITIES IN CLASS. KEEP IT UP.
JOSEPHINE IS BECOMING MORE EXPRESSIVE, SHOWING EXCITEMENT CLEARLY THROUGH GESTURES. SHE MOVES AROUND CONFIDENTLY, SHOWING IMPROVED BALANCE AND COORDINATION. SHE IS MAKING PROGRESS.
JOSEPHINE ENJOY INVESTIGATING NEW MATERIALS AND SHOWS INTEREST IN HOW THINGS WORK. SHE ENJOYS SCRIBBLING AND COLOURING AND SHE IS WORKING ON PENCIL GRIP. SHE CAN DO BETTER.

JOSEPHINE CAN RECITE ALPHABET FROM A TO Z AND ENJOY SINGING A B C RHYME ALONG WITH THE TEACHER. SHE ENJOYS JOLLY PHONICS RHYMES AND IDENTIFIES SOUNDS SUCH AS /a/, /t/, /f/ ALONG WITH MATCHING OBJECTS. SHE IS PROGRESSING WELL.
JOSEPHINE CAN COUNT NUMBERS FROM 1 TO 10 WITH THE TEACHER'S SUPPORT AND SHE IS ABLE TO IDENTIFY SHAPES SUCH AS CIRCLE AND STAR. SHE IS IMPROVING.
